entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
